WITH TMP1 AS ( SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND ROAD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND BULD_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND #{param2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} IS NULL
AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND ADM_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND LNBR_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND HEMD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND LNBR_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND ADM_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param2}||'%'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, HEMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN, LNBR_MNNM, LNBR_SLNO FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE CTP_NM = #{ctpNmParam} AND SIG_NM = #{sigNmParam} AND HEMD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'
AND POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param2}||'%'
AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT DISTINCT A.ZIP_NO_SEQ, A.ZIP_NO, A.CTP_NM, A.SIG_NM, A.HEMD_NM, A.LNBR_MNNM, A.LNBR_SLNO, A.ROAD_NM, A.BULD_MNNM, A.BULD_SLNO, A.BD_MGT_SN, A.POS_BUL_NM, C.BULD_DTL_NM FROM TMP1 A, ST_BLDG_ADDR_INFO C WHERE A.BD_MGT_SN = C.BD_MGT_SN ORDER BY 1

mapper.sql: /* 도로명+건물번호 월드컵북로 396 건물명 누리꿈스퀘어 지역명(동/리)+번지 상암동 1605 지역명(동/리)+건물명 */ WITH TMP1 AS ( SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE ROAD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%' AND BULD_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%' AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%' AND #{param2} IS NULL AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE ADM_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%' -- 법정동명(고척동) AND LNBR_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%' -- 지번본번 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE HEMD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%' -- 행정동명(고척1동) AND LNBR_MNNM LIKE #{param2}||'%' -- 지번본번 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE ADM_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'-- 법정동명(고척동) AND POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param2}||'%'-- 시군구건물명 AND USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ZIP_NO_SEQ, ZIP_NO, CTP_NM, SIG_NM, EMD_NM, ROAD_CD, ROAD_NM, BULD_SE_CD, BULD_MNNM, BULD_SLNO, POS_BUL_NM, EMD_NO, BD_MGT_SN FROM ST_ZIP_NO WHERE HEMD_NM LIKE #{param1}||'%'-- 행정동명(고척1동) AND POS_BUL_NM LIKE #{param2}||'%'-- 시군구건물명 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) SELECT DISTINCT A.ZIP_NO_SEQ, A.ZIP_NO, A.CTP_NM ||' '|| -- 시도명 A.SIG_NM ||' '|| -- 시군구명 CASE B.EMD_SE WHEN '0' THEN '' || A.EMD_NM ELSE '' END ||' '|| A.ROAD_NM || CASE WHEN A.BULD_SE_CD = '0' THEN '' WHEN A.BULD_SE_CD = '1' THEN '지하' WHEN A.BULD_SE_CD = '2' THEN '공중' END ||' '|| A.BULD_MNNM || CASE A.BULD_SLNO WHEN '0' THEN ' ' ELSE '-' || A.BULD_SLNO END || CASE WHEN (B.EMD_SE = '0' AND C.COMN_HS_YN = '0') THEN ' ' WHEN (B.EMD_SE = '0' AND C.COMN_HS_YN = '1') THEN CASE COALESCE(A.POS_BUL_NM, '') WHEN '' THEN ' ' ELSE ' ('||A.POS_BUL_NM||')' END WHEN (B.EMD_SE = '1' AND C.COMN_HS_YN = '0') THEN ' ('||B.EMD_NM||')' WHEN (B.EMD_SE = '1' AND C.COMN_HS_YN = '1') THEN ' ('||B.EMD_NM|| CASE COALESCE(A.POS_BUL_NM, '') WHEN '' THEN ')' ELSE ', '||A.POS_BUL_NM||')' END END AS ADDRESS FROM TMP1 A, ST_ROAD_CD B, ST_BLDG_ADDR_INFO C WHERE SUBSTRING(A.ROAD_CD, 1, 5) = B.SIG_CD AND SUBSTRING(A.ROAD_CD, 6,12) = B.ROAD_NO AND A.EMD_NO = B.EMD_NO AND A.BD_MGT_SN = C.BD_MGT_SN ORDER BY ZIP_NO_SEQ
